title: 100. $240 Billion Restaurant Recovery Fund | Restaurant Recovery Special Series
description: The National Restaurant Association (NRA) just proposed a $240 billion blueprint for restaurant recovery to Congress. In this special episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron breaks down the proposal’s key points and explores next steps for the industry at large.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
